name: Spinach and Apple Salad
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, quick, salads and dressings
keywords: apple, spinach, low calorie, side dish
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Wash spinach and remove tough stems. Break spinach into bite-size pieces.
Wash apple and cut into thin strips, leaving peel on.
In a serving bowl, whisk the oil, lemon juice and vinegar; add the spinach and apple, and mix thoroughly to coat well. Season with pepper.
